11 Remarks

I certify that I am the authorized signatory of the shipper (as stated on the House Bill of Lading) and the statements made and all information contained herein are true and correct. We understand that civil and criminal penalties may be imposed for making false and fraudulent statements herein, failing to provide the requested information or for violation of SOLAS.


The shipper shall indemnify , their employees, subcontractors, agents or anyone involved in the carriage of these goods and hold them harmless in respect of any liability, loss, damage or expense of whatsoever nature (including container reworking cost) resulting from the inaccuracy or inadequacy of the information provided.

This is to certify that the articles / substances of this shipment properly described by name, that they are not listed in the current edition of Dangerous Goods Regulations (DGR), Alphabetical list of dangerous goods nor do they correspond to any of the hazard clause appearing in the DGR, section 3, classification of dangerous goods that they are known to be not dangerous, i.e. not restricted. Furthermore, the shipper confirms that the goods are in proper condition for transportation on cargo carrying vessels. These goods do not contain acid, nor do they contain any hazardous chemicals.
